runs.comm: gets some inward movement right away, he gets into an awkward position before pushing it back to PK
at PK's pace, there is hardly any bounce from the surface, van Wyk looked to force it off the back foot, but it tricked away towards mid on
straight on a length in the corridor outside off, Amla stays in the crease to guide it to third man with an open bat face
PK beats both van Wyk and Dhoni with the low bounce, van Wyk went for a swipe across the line and missed, Dhoni got up too quickly, was hit on the gloves, and conceded four byes
on the stumps, punched away to mid off
PK, who normally gets huge movement, is not getting much here, straight as an arrow from back of a length, and it is pushed back to him
goes across Hashim from a length, who has a big heave and misses, dhoni is smart this time, keeps his pads together, and lets the ball hit them on the bounce

right through him! Amla was rooted to the crease and again played across the line, and again missed, but the ball was on target this time, moved back in a shade too, and pegged back off stump, Amla looks surprised, Nehra looks on matter-of-factly
goes back and taps this one to the man at slip
works it wide of midwicket for a single
played out to point off the back foot
looks to swing across the line, but misses again, that shot is just not on on this track, and is hit on the pads but way down the leg side
and is picked away over deep midwicket right away, van Wyk likes the extra pace compared to PK, and the angle into him from over the wicket helps too, as he lifts it high and clean
goes off side now, just stayed on the crease and creamed the length delivery through cover point
another one, Munaf has had a horror start, this one is right in the slot, full and on the stumps, and he lifts it straight back over the bowler's head
cuts down on the pace, and it works right away, pushed into the covers off the back foot for a single
angled across Ingram who forces it to extra cover
the slower one again, outside off stump, he looks to cut but is undone by the lack of pace and bounce, Dhoni stands tall and stops the ball with his pads close together
Ashish gets the treatment from ban Wyk now, this one bounced alright and was pulled away over deep midwicket, he got quickly into position and went through with the shot
not short enough for the pull, but van wyk goes for it anyway, and it rockets off the bat, but there is protection on the square leg boundary
gets hit on the pad with the ball coming into him from over the wicket, and then hares down for a non-existent single, and is rightly sent back
goes for the heave, gets it off the inside edge through square leg
goes for the extra cover drive from the crease, the ball is angled across him, and he is beaten, did not get forward that time
slapped away to extra cover off the back foot
goes for the swing over midwicket, but gets an inside edge that rolls away just wide of the stumps, how did that miss?

the slower one does the trick for Munaf, it was widish outside off, Ingram went for the slash, and the ball looped in the air for PK to take a simple catch at short third man, the lack of pace did him, he was already into the shot but could not get much on it
gets a fuller ball around off, and reaches out to drive it to mid off
the quickest of quick singles, it was pushed down to mid on and they went scampering through, van Wyk's bat turned in his hand, and had the throw hit, it would have been curtains
picks up the slower one, and helps it on its way backward of square leg, the line was awary from Munaf, way down the leg side
shot! it was almost in the blockhole, he remained on the back foot, and squeezed it in to the gap between short third man and backward point, what a deft shot
skips right away down the track, and pushes this flighted ball to mid on
van Wyk can't do anything wrong, he comes down the pitch, and chips it into the air, the ball clears the infield comfortably and trickles into the straight boundary
strays down the leg side
van wyk takes off! went down on a knee and lifted him over deep midwicket for maximum
worked away down to long on for a single
another single, this time worked away to square leg

stops at the crease and bowls it slower, it turns in from outside off, and he gets a thick outside edge on the cut, but Munaf at short third man returns the favour to South Africa who were sloppy earlier, by letting the ball through his legs
slow and angled into the batsman who waits and guides wide of point
rocks back and punches, but no timing on the shot
lovely stroke from AB, it was tossed up a little bit, and he lifted it over extra civer in an instant and it disappeared into the ropes
fuller, same result, creamed past the man at extra cover for another boundary
hit down to long on for a single, smart batting
goes for the off drive, but cannot connect properly, and the ball rolls away in to the off side
tap and run, knocked away towards point for a single
van Wyk goes for it, and gets to his 50 with a pick-up shot over deep midwicket, it was full and he casually lifted it over Nehra on the boundary
looks to steer this one, but it was too full for the shot
turned away to midwicket this time
AB doing it smartly, pushing it to point for a single
goes back and cuts away to sweeper cover for a single
in the corridor outside off and holding its line, he looks to play the cute steer, but is beaten
walkway across and outside the off stump, but PK has bowled this one so wide that he still can't reach it
goes fuller and on the stumps, and he drives it past the non-striker's stumps to bring up the 50 of the partnership
short and wide from PK, van Wyk capitalises, hammers it past a desperately diving extra cover for a boundary
a touch fuller, only a touch, off the bottom half of the blade to midwicket as he looks to swat it away
straight on middle and leg, not much to be done with it, and he plays it back to PK
tapped to point for a single to retain the strike

tosses it up, and he lofts it to the right of Nehra at sweeper cover, who relays the ball to Raina at extra cover, who in turn hits the stumps with a pinpoint throw, and AB is well short of the crease on the second run, India have got a wicket out of nowhere, van Wyk is still there though
goes back and guides it through point for a single
tossed up, gets forward and pushes it back to Yuvraj

Yuvi has taken out JP! soft dismissal, he just walked across the stumps, looking to work the ball square on the leg side, misses and is hit bang in front of the stumps, the finger goes up, and Yuvraj roars
goes across Miller who rocks back and guides it in front of point
punched away wide of long off for a single, they ponder a second for a second, but the thought is abandoned the next instant
fuller on the stumps, and hit down to long on for a single
goes back and punches wide of long off
he plays this shot really well, stays back and beside the line, and just guides it with an open bat face, but straight to point this time

van Wyk has thrown it away, it was angled in on leg stump, he put the front leg forward and swung it straight to Ashish on the deep square leg boundary, who caught the ball and just stood rooted to the ground, for effect. Huge, huge wicket
goes down on one knee and sweeps PK from outside off stump, he connects nicely and gets it fine down the leg side
looks to hit this one outside off through point but cannot get the timing right
driven to extra cover off the front foot
almost yorker length, scooped back to the bowler
rolls off the pads to short fine leg
full on leg stump, nurdled to midwicket, cannot beat the man there
comes forward to drive to extra cover
full toss, hit through midwicket, there is a huge mix up as the throw comes in high at the striker's end, the batsman puts is the desperate dive to just about make his ground
played away to midwicket
on leg stump, slapped away in the air to deep midwicket
goes back and punches but straight to Virat at short extra cover
short, half-tracker, Miller rocks back and pulls it in an instant rows and rows into the crowd over deep midwicket

YK has struck! it was flat and angled in from round the stumps, he looked to swipe across the line, missed, and that was going to hit leg, I reckon. The umpire thought so and sent Miller on his way, South Africa are in trouble now, Yusuf is pumped up
tucked away wide of midwicket for a single
punched back to the bowler
angled across the batsman who pushes forward and is beaten
full toss down the leg side, gets away with it, as it is hit away to deep midwicket
reverse sweep from Botha from outside off, gets it away past short third man
fired in on leg stump, worked away through midwicket
Peterson looks to reverse sweep this angled delivery which doesn't get up much and misses, Dhoni collects
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot, YK and Peterson collide as Yusuf rushes to field the ball
Botha gets one in the slot, and goes down on a knee to swing it over wide long on
goes back and hits it away towards mid off
Peterson gives Kohli catching practice, it was angled across him, he came forward and lifted straight into Virat's hands at short extra cover, South Africa are imploding now
flat and on the stumps, he rocks back and hits it straight down the ground past a diving Yusuf for a single
very flat and quick, he punches it straight to the man at short extra cover
pushed to short extra cover off the front foot
drops it short and flat, he goes back but hits it straight back at Ashwin
driven to long off for a single
pushes it back to Ashwin who fails to field it cleanly and concedes the run
shortish outside off stump, steered to short third man for a single
rocks back and punches it to sweeper cover for another run, they need some boundaries here
cannot get the flatter one away, off the bottom half of the bat to midwicket
fires it in fast and flat from round the stumps, he misses out on the pull and takes it on the pads
another dot ball, driven straight to Virat at short extra cover
connects with the pull this time but deep midwicket is there and only a single results
another swipe, and another single to deep midwicket, the asking rate has crossed 12
Parnell charges down the track, and gets a lucky inside edge past the stumps and past Dhoni, the fielder slips near the boundary and they take three
gets a boundary off the first ball, its a full toss outside off, and he creams it in the gap through extra cover, right, what will Nehra bowl now?
gets it close to the blockhole this time, and it is squeezed down the ground to long off, Nehra got it to tail into the batsman there
length ball coming in around leg stump, worked away square for a single
good delivery, shortens the length and he can only push it towards mid off for a single
direct hit from extra cover, it was a full toss and smashed to Raina, who hit the stumps, but Botha had made his ground, replays confirm that
gets it full on the stumps, and Parnell swings it down to long on, good comeback from Nehra after the boundary off the first ball
starts with a wide down the leg side from round the stumps
on the money, and PArnell can only push it back to the bowler
looks to hit out against the pressure, but can only pull it back to Ashwin
Ashwin gets one, it was fuller on the leg stump, and Parnell swung it straight down the throat of deep square leg where Yusuf takes it gleefully
excellent stuff from Ashwin, right in the blockhole, squeezed back to the bowler
played out to midwicket, cannot buy a run at the moment
and again, straight to midwicket, what an over by Ashwin, only two runs off it, one off a wide
hit down to long on, and Rohit;s throw beats Dhoni but no damage done as it is stopped at fine leg
its almost over for South Africa, Botha picks out Rohit on the long on boundary with the lofted shot
backs away outside leg stump, Nehra follows him, and hits him high in the thigh pad
goes across Makhaya from a length, who swings in the air from the crease
swings again, and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
squeezed away to extra cover for a single, and India have come back remarkably to win this one
